SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by RCR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RN , RCR.*, M.* FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND RENTAL_DATE > SYSDATE AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword} )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE RENTAL_DATE > SYSDATE AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by RCR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RN , RCR.*, M.* FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND RETURN_DATE < SYSDATE AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword} )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE RETURN_DATE < SYSDATE AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER by RCR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RN , RCR.*, M.* FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN RENTAL_DATE AND RETURN_DATE AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword} )
WHERE RN BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN RENTAL_DATE AND RETURN_DATE AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{keyword}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO , RENTAL_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_PLACE) AS RENTAL_PLACE_NAME , RETURN_PLACE , FN_COMM_NAME(RETURN_PLACE) AS RETURN_PLACE_NAME , RENTAL_DATE , RETURN_DATE , RCR.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER , RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO , FN_COMM_NAME(RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO) AS RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NAME , RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID , NAME AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_NAME , HP AS RESERVATION_MEMBER_HP , REGULAR_PRICE , SALE_RATE , FINAL_RESERVATION_PRICE , REG_ID , REG_DATE , MOD_ID , MOD_DATE , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_FUEL_CODE) AS FUEL_NAME , FN_COMM_NAME(CAR_TYPE_CODE) AS TYPE_NAME , CAR_NAME FROM RENTAL_CAR_RESERVATION RCR, MEMBER M, RENTAL_CAR RC, NEW_CAR NC WHERE RCR.RESERVATION_MEMBER_ID = M.ID AND RCR.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER = RC.CAR_IDENTIFICATION_NUMBER AND RC.CAR_NO = NC.NO AND RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo} AND RENTAL_CAR_BRANCH_NO = #{branchCode}
